transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Meri Mr. Asmat ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Hi sir, Vishal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Good morning, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Uh, hello?
Executive: Hello? Baat ho sakti hai sir aapki do minute?
Customer: Ek tender laga hai.
Executive: Uh, tender? Okay, baat karo, baat karo.
Executive: Haan, actually mein aapka na ek feedback raise hua tha sir. Aapki kisi executive se baat hui thi. Uske baad
Customer: Executive se baat ko kuch bhi, kuch bhi problem hai. Mein IndiaMART se zyada time call kiya tha ye mera lead correct nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Lead ka issue aa raha hai sir aapko?
Customer: Haan, Kerala ka lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kis type ke lead aap chahte hai aap mujhe bataiye?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Uh, kis type ke lead aap chahte hai sir IndiaMART se? Please explain kariye.
Customer: Wo Kerala ka lead acche se nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kerala location ki hi aapko chahiye sir?
Customer: Haan, Kerala location chahiye tha.
Executive: Okay, sir Kerala se na aapke account mein ek lead mujhe dikha rahi hai office ye cubicle ke naam se. India mein function wala.
Customer: Function wala.
Executive: Uh, matlab iski na category jo usme map ho rakhi hai wo house construction service hi hai sir. Relevant hogi kya ye aapke liye?
Customer: Haan, wo relevant hai.
Executive: Uh, ek bari open karenge sir Kerala ka hai?
Customer: Haan, wo Kerala location ka dikha raha hai.
Executive: Aap ek bari open karenge sir app?
Customer: Abhi mein ek dusra ek meeting pe hai mein, mein ko thoda baad mein mein call karega aapko. Okay, ye number.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says Kerala leads are not correct.



Resolution:

- Executive mentioned a lead named office cubicle.
- Executive confirmed the lead is from Kerala location.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, kerala, location, account
